fields.summary: iOS: App gives error for, center and span, being nan (iOS 6)

Titanium SDK: 2.1.3.v20120907163110

comments.body:
Can not reproduce this with either master or latest 2.1.3 on IOS6 device or simulator.

Tested with both Xcode 4.3.1 and Xcode 4.5 GM. Both devices running IOS6 GM Seed

Environment used for verification -
Titanium SDK: 2.1.3.v20120915120319
Titanium Â Studio:2.1.2.201208301612
Device : iPad iOS 6.0
Xcode : 4.5 
Machine OS : MAC 10.8
